casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Richard BRAY. No. 563P97-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of July 2008 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of December 2008."
